title: Vikrama Simhapuri University Alumni Association
description: A Python application was developed for Vikrama Simhapuri University to engage with alumni, facilitating online interaction as educational institutions increasingly embrace digital communication. The system aims to offer a centralized platform, enabling efficient management of alumni information, monitoring career advancements, coordinating events, and nurturing networking avenues.

title: Energy Efficient Management System
description: In Finland, due to low temperatures, people rely on HVAC systems for warmth and air quality, but these systems emit carbon dioxide. The cost of electricity to power HVAC varies; using renewable sources like wind or solar power reduces expenses. To mitigate costs, Finland implemented the Building Energy Efficient Project, aimed at making HVAC systems more energy-efficient.
